title: Darkmoon Engine
subtitle: Game engine based real time rasterization and ray tracing with RT core hardware acceleration
description:
A high-performance 3D rendering engine built from scratch using modern Vulkan and Rust. This project demonstrates advanced graphics programming techniques including:

• Physically Based Rendering (PBR) pipeline
• Real-time shadows with cascade shadow mapping
• Deferred rendering for optimal performance
• Post-processing effects (SSAO, Bloom, Tone mapping)
• Model loading with Assimp integration
• Custom shader management system
• Frustum culling and occlusion culling optimization

The renderer supports various lighting models, material systems, and provides a flexible architecture for creating complex 3D scenes. Performance optimizations include instanced rendering, GPU-driven rendering, and efficient memory management.

title: Rust Engine
subtitle: My first real time game engine built in Rust
description: My first real time game engine built in Rust, focuses on real-time and physics simulation with Bullet Physics. This engine is designed to handle multiplataform with vulkan,Dx12 and metal api backends

title: Offline render engine
subtitle: My first offline render engine using Python and Nvidia Cuda
description:
An advanced shader development environment that provides real-time editing and preview capabilities. This tool is designed to streamline the shader development workflow:

• Live shader compilation and error reporting
• Node-based visual shader editor
• Real-time preview with customizable 3D scenes
• Hot-reload functionality for rapid iteration
• Support for multiple shading languages (HLSL, GLSL)
• Built-in library of common shader patterns
• Performance profiling and optimization suggestions
• Export functionality for various game engines

The editor features a modern interface built with C# and WPF, utilizing DirectX for rendering. It includes debugging tools, visual node graphs for complex shader logic, and integration with popular game engines.

title: Vulcano
subtitle: Turn-based multiplayer NFT game
description:
A complete multiplayer NFT-based strategy game built in Unreal Engine. Vulcano features turn-based gameplay mechanics with blockchain integration for unique digital assets:

• Turn-based strategy gameplay with card mechanics
• NFT integration for unique collectible cards
• Real-time multiplayer using Amazon GameLift
• Anti-cheat protection with Easy Anti-Cheat
• Cross-platform compatibility
• Marketplace for trading NFT cards
• Ranking and tournament systems
• Custom game engine optimizations

The game combines traditional strategy gameplay with modern blockchain technology, creating a unique gaming experience where players truly own their in-game assets.

title: Los asombrosos viajes de Zamba y Nina por la Argentina
subtitle: Educational interactive series for children
description:
An educational interactive experience developed for Pakapaka (Public Television Argentina) featuring the beloved characters Zamba and Nina. This project combines entertainment with education to teach children about Argentine geography and culture:

• Interactive storytelling with educational content
• Real-time 3D environments representing Argentine regions
• Character animation and voice acting integration
• Mini-games and interactive elements
• Educational content about Argentine history and geography
• Child-friendly user interface design
• Accessibility features for diverse audiences
• Integration with broadcast television content

The project was developed using Unreal Engine to create immersive, educational experiences that engage children while teaching them about their country's rich cultural heritage.

title: Anim Reflect Plugin
subtitle: Little Tool for mirrored animations in Unreal Engine
description: AnimReflect (formerly known as MirrorAnimationSystem) is a plugin for Unreal Engine that allows for dynamic animation reversal. This plugin is based on the original MirrorAnimationSystem project created by Rexocrates. AnimReflect incorporates functionalities that enable mirroring animations with their root motion at runtime, both within the editor and during gameplay.
